name: hyper-potion
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 200 HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 120 HP to a single Pokémon.
